name: Soup: The Game - Souped Up Edition
name_original: Soup: The Game - Souped Up Edition
description:
Help Benny the Bug save his soup from the evil Spheres of Influence, and their horrific allies, the Pink One-eyed Squids. The Cheeses are also hanging around, and they don't like to be disturbed!

This is a remastered / re-imagined version of Soup: The Game, a game I made as quickly as possible during a stream. The 'Souped Up Edition' had a lot more effort put into it, but was still made to be a quick little project - so you'll undoubtedly see a lot of cut corners.

This is also meant to be a preview of Soup: The Game - PHASE TWO, which will be coming...at some point! It's going to be a bigger game, but will follow the same basic concepts you see here. Planned features:

  • Three episodes of platforming fun
  • Additional abilities for Benny
  • A few more enemies
  • Soup-related edutainment
  • The ability to save!

Until then, enjoy this remastered edition of The Greatest Game Ever Made™.

--

Sprite assets from Kenney (mostly)

Sounds from Freesound / bfxr

Music from The Games Factory

--

Note: I'm not 100% sure that the Debian version works properly. Please give it a try first and report back if you can - I would like to get it working if possible!
